name: ext_R2_Medication_product
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Medication.product for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Medication.product from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Information that only applies to products (not packages).
element.comment: `Medication` maps to R4B `Medication`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children unless an empty Parameters resource
constraint.expression: hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count()) or $this is Parameters

constraint.human: Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url
